name: 07th Theater
summary: 07th Theater is a crossover between Higurashi, Umineko, Higanbana, and Rose Guns Days.

name: 07Gorillas
summary: 07Gorillas is a top-down roguelike arena shooter game, you control one gorilla from a squad of seven break into "Foggy Zone" on a cleanup mission. Missions lasts less than 20 minutes, fight your way with powerful kung fu and tactical consumables, don't forget internal force enhancement.
